title: Republican Party during Civil War - econ. policies

content.prompt: During the Civil War, the Republican Party passed legislation promoting economic development concerning all of the following EXCEPT the

choices.label: granting of government subsidies to encourage the export of manufactured goods
establishment of a high tariff to protect American industry from foreign competition
organization of a national banking system to provide a uniform national currency
provision of government loans and land grants to private companies to construct a transcontinental railroad

topic.text: 5.9: Government Policies During the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
